item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Anna Liffey's

Working on Specials- OK got the 411!!

Will have apps including wings and other munchies
Spoke with the manager will have drink specials, inquire with the bartender at the time of purchase

There is a possibility that I won't be there, I will be recovering from surgery. If I can't make it manager I spoke with is Jason.

Contact is Liz F. email through the site.
item.name: Labor Day Happy Hour@ Anna Liffey's
